en.select_folder_title: Select a folder containing PDF files
en.confirm_merge_message: Are you sure you want to merge {count} files?
en.select_one_file_message: Please select at least one file to print.
en.select_at_least_two_files_for_merge: Please select at least two files to merge.
en.confirm_print_message: Are you sure you want to print {count} file(s) to the printer '{printer}'?
en.app_description: A comprehensive tool for managing and processing PDF files
en.feature_merge_desc: Combine multiple PDFs into one file
en.feature_split_desc: Split a PDF into separate files
en.feature_compress_desc: Reduce the size of PDF files
en.feature_rotate_desc: Rotate PDF pages at different angles
en.feature_convert_desc: Convert PDF to images or text and vice versa
en.feature_settings_desc: Customize the application to your needs
en.new_folder_will_be_created: A new folder will be created
en.pdf_load_success: Loaded {count} pages with high resolution and smooth transitions!
en.save_success_summary:
File saved successfully!
{path}

Rotated {rotated_count} pages
Added {stamp_count} stamps on {page_count} pages
en.load_pdf_first: You must load a PDF file first!
en.stamp_placement_guide: Move the mouse to preview the stamp and click to place it.
en.auto_folder_creation: A folder will be created automatically on your Desktop
en.settings_welcome_message: Welcome to ApexFlow Settings! You can customize appearance, fonts and more
en.theme_changed_notification: Theme changed. You can see the preview below
en.accent_color_changed_notification: Accent color changed. You can see the preview below
en.font_changed_notification: Font settings changed. You can see the preview below
en.unsaved_changes_warning: You have unsaved changes! Save or discard changes before closing
en.settings_closed: Settings closed. Thank you for using ApexFlow!
en.all_settings_saved_successfully: All settings saved successfully! Changes will appear immediately
en.all_changes_canceled_message: All changes canceled and original settings restored
en.language_changed_message: Language changed. Save settings to apply the change
en.settings_modified_notification: Settings modified. Don't forget to save changes
en.low_transparency_warning: Low transparency - text may become hard to read
en.no_file_selected_for_properties_update: No file selected for properties update
en.reset_defaults_info_message: All settings will be reset to default values when the application starts next time
en.show_exit_warning_option: Show warning when exiting with unsaved changes
en.remember_exit_choice_option: Remember my choice in warning dialog
en.dont_ask_again_and_discard_option: Don't ask again and discard changes when navigating between pages
en.remember_my_choice: Remember my choice and don't ask again
en.unsaved_changes_prompt: You have unsaved changes in the settings. Do you want to save them before moving to another page?
en.dont_ask_again_and_discard: Don't ask again and discard changes
en.dont_ask_again_info: The option to not ask again and discard changes has been activated. You can return to this option in the settings section from the save page.
en.transparency_feature_coming_soon: Transparency feature will be available soon
en.unsaved_changes_prompt: You have unsaved changes. What would you like to do?
en.font_preview_dynamic_text: Font Preview: {family} at size {size} with weight {weight}
en.confirm_reset_message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?
en.confirm_reset_informative: All your current custom settings will be lost.
en.reset_success_message: All settings have been successfully reset to default!
en.reset_error_message: An error occurred while resetting to default settings.
en.confirm_save_default_message: Do you want to save the current settings as the new default?
en.confirm_save_default_informative: This will replace the current default settings.
en.save_default_success_message: Current settings have been saved as the new default!
en.save_default_error_message: An error occurred while saving the default settings.
en.change_report_max_memory: â€¢ Max Memory: {original} MB â†’ {current} MB
en.no_changes_report: No changes have been made to the settings.
en.confirm_cancel_changes_message: Are you sure you want to cancel all changes?
en.unexpected_save_error:
An unexpected error occurred during save:
{e}
en.error_importing_module: Failed to load module for {page_name} page
en.welcome_choose_preferences: Welcome! Please choose your preferred settings:
en.can_change_settings_later: You can change these settings later from the Settings menu
en.welcome_to_apexflow_info: Welcome to ApexFlow! You can change these settings later from the Settings menu
en.settings_saved_successfully: Settings saved successfully! Welcome to ApexFlow
en.settings_issues_detected: Settings issues detected, default values will be used
en.select_conversion_operation_first: Please select a conversion operation first
